amendment.description: To modify the designation of the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in St. Augustine, Florida.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2657 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S5716; text: CR S5716) To modify the designation of the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in St. Augustine, Florida.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2657 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
